chapter.title: Connectors

blockquote.para: This chapter documents APIs for various programming languages -- C, Perl, Ruby, PHP and Python.

chapter.para: Apart from the native Tarantool client driver, you can always use a Memcached driver of your choice, after enabling Memcached protocol in the configuration file.

section.title: C
section.para: Please see connector/c in the source tree.

section.title: PHP
section.para: Please see connector/php in the source tree.

section.title: Ruby
section.para: You need Ruby 1.9 or later to use this connector. Connector sources are located in http://github.com/mailru/tarantool-ruby.
